resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "message": {
                "type": "keyword",
                "ignore_above": 20
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    document={
        "message": "Syntax error"
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="2",
    document={
        "message": "Syntax error with some long stacktrace"
    },
)
print(resp2)

resp3 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    aggs={
        "messages": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "message"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp3)
